sentences: Tony Sun (Chinese: 孫協志; pinyin: Sūn Xié Zhì; born 20 February 1978) is a Taiwanese actor, singer, host and baseball player.
Sun gained much solo experience by releasing several well-received albums in Taiwanese Hokkien in the 1990s.
Sun was signed under Jungiery since his earlier career days.
On 21 November 2011, Sun married actress Han Yu.
In October 2015, the couple announced their divorce; they had no children.
